channel.title: What happend to moparscape?
channel.description:
Don't you miss the old moparscape?
The one where u could acyually find a good server sit down and play it?...of course you do!
One's where u don't lag alot
i just wish that it could come back..
some of u people think im crazy but i know you want the old forums back deep inside you. Ones where you can actually post pictures, post to tell people how good it is i know i have a good point about this to i just wish MoparScape could come back. some people may agree or disagree thats ok i just want to let know what i think.i know im not important in life but yea... this is what i think..so i hope you will do the same so i hope it comes back...so i vote the old forums!!! ;D

item.title: What happend to moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @darkandlightjak5 darkandlightjak5
item.description:
@darkandlightjak5 wrote:

What the hell is different from the “old” Moparscape, to this Moparscape? Hardly any, and the only main difference is that we have to use the server status page. The tutorials are gone because of noob leechers use them for there server, and don’t give any credit to the owners. In my point of view, this new Moparscape is ten times better. No leechers getting tutorials, spamming up the advertisement section.

Read full topic

item.title: What happend to moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

To be honest,i do like old moparscape.
But its not ever coming back,face the fact.

Read full topic

item.title: What happend to moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @milktree milktree
item.description:
@milktree wrote:

the new moparscape isnt that fun as it used to be. every fun server crashes and moparscape would be cool if all the ai bots where in the game and you can do the normal quests and every thing is there like in normal runescape and you can do all the mopar commands and stuff in it.

Read full topic

item.title: What happend to moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @uu83r_pwn4g3 uu83r pwn4g3
item.description:
@uu83r_pwn4g3 wrote:

lol servers these days are completely boring except for skilling,showing off your riches (lol), and pking

and like every server i see anymore has been leeched or copied form another server
in other words…there all the same server with different names…lol

Read full topic
